_header: Ere Christ into clouds gan flyeth up so swiftly
Title(s): How the Apostles made the Creed
_description: How the Apostles made the Creed, by Farnelay — thirteen l0-line stanzas

BLAdd32578.First Lines:
Or christ into cloudes gan flyeȝ up to swyftlyÞe pater
                    noster pyght was in boke to be brought…
BLAdd32578.Last Lines:
…Withouten any mysse mary þu prayÞat we may come to
                    blisse. Amen quod ffarneday.
BLAdd32578.Editions:
Bowers,  Robert Hood. 
             “Three Middle English Poems on the Apostles’ Creed.” 
             PMLA
         70 (1955): 210-22: 217-22.
